summary: Because of their children's bad grades, some parents want the teacher Mrs. Müller gone. They meet with Mrs. Müller and try to convince her to leave the class.
cast: Gabriela Maria Schmeide|Justus von Dohnányi|Anke Engelke|Ken Duken|Mina Tander|Alwara Höfels|Rainer Galke|Jürgen Maurer|Dagmar Sachse|Rebecca Dinkelborg|Floris Hoffbauer|Gretchen Kunz|Hugo Kunz
title: Frau Müller muss weg!
